creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
inscription: 昭和六年七月 {Shōwa rokunen shichigatsu} (July 1931)
markings: red artist's seal: 深水 {Shinsui}; LRC, publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe} | on back, red seal: 貮百五拾枚絶版　第貮百四拾貮番 {nihyakugojū mai zeppan, dai nihyakuyonjūni ban} (edition of 250, number 242); red square publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
portfolio: The First Collection of Modern Beauties (Gendai bijin shū dai isshū 現代美人集第一輯)
text: A young woman with Western hairstyle carries a cage with three fireflies that she already caught and she is looking out for a fourth flying right in front of her.
title: Firefly Catching
